title: New Study Claims Chocolate Cures Cancer
text: A groundbreaking study from an obscure lab claims that eating chocolate daily can cure cancer. The study, not peer-reviewed, suggests cocoa beans have 'miracle compounds' that shrink tumors overnight. No reputable scientists have backed this claim, and the lab's website sells chocolate supplements.

title: Scientists Discover New Species of Fish in Pacific Ocean
text: Marine biologists from NOAA announced the discovery of a new fish species, named *Luminara pacifica*, in the Pacific Ocean. The fish, found at a depth of 3,000 meters, has bioluminescent fins and was documented in a peer-reviewed study in *Marine Biology*.

title: Alien Fossils Found in Antarctica
text: A viral blog post claims researchers uncovered alien fossils in Antarctica, with 'skeletal remains unlike anything on Earth.' The post cites an anonymous 'whistleblower' and includes blurry images. No scientific institutions have confirmed these findings.

title: New Solar Panel Design Boosts Efficiency by 30%
text: Engineers at MIT developed a solar panel with a novel perovskite-based design, increasing energy conversion efficiency by 30%. The findings, published in *Nature Energy*, could reduce solar energy costs significantly.

title: Tom Hanks Secretly Runs a Time Travel Agency
text: A conspiracy website claims Tom Hanks operates a covert time travel agency, sending celebrities to 'alter history.' The site provides no evidence beyond doctored photos and vague anecdotes.

title: Breakthrough in Alzheimer’s Research Shows Promise
text: A study from Johns Hopkins University found a new drug that slows Alzheimer’s progression in mice by targeting amyloid plaques. Human trials are set to begin in 2025, according to *The Lancet*.

text: A self-proclaimed historian claims dinosaurs constructed the Egyptian pyramids using 'advanced intelligence.' The theory, shared on a podcast, ignores archaeological evidence and has been debunked by Egyptologists.

text: The Coral Restoration Foundation reported a 40% increase in successful coral replanting efforts across the Caribbean in 2024. Their work, supported by UNESCO, aims to combat reef degradation.

text: A US therapy, approved in 2024, targets tumors in 85% of breast cancer patients. The study was published in *The Lancet Oncology*.

title: Alien Fossils Found in Arctic
text: A blog claims alien fossils were found in the Arctic, with 'leaked photos.' Geologists say they’re ancient fish bones, not extraterrestrial.

title: Recycled Plastic Makes Clothes
text: A US company’s clothes, made from recycled plastic, cut waste by 60%. Launched in 2024, they were featured in *Journal of Cleaner Production*.

title: New Depression Therapy Lifts Mood
text: A US therapy, approved in 2024, lifts mood
